alert.note: Alert for Wilcox (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued November 30 at 1:25AM CST until November 30 at 2:15AM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Wilcox County in south central Alabama... * Until 215 AM CST. * At 125 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles northwest of Magnolia, or 9 miles southeast of Linden, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Wilcox County. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 AM CST for south central Alabama. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 AM CST for south central Alabama.
